name: UNHALLOWED: THE CABIN
detailed_description:
Your Brother and his pregnant wife go to an old family cabin on the river to practice ancient Magik to save their unborn child. It's been months since you have heard from them so you set out down the river to the cabin to find out what happened!

The cabin has many secrets and items that can be used to complete the game. Not all puzzles must be solved but certain ones must be solved to progress. The game extends beyond the cabin but we don't want to give everything away!

Gameplay length:
Gameplay will depend on how quickly puzzles are solved. If you have played already and know what you're doing it will take roughly 20 minutes. If not it could take hours.


Features:
Survival - It's an exploratory game with limited items to help you solve puzzles. Headphones will help you hear in the direction of
certain sounds to aid in discovery. There are some random AI, so scares can happen at different times and there are ways to hide from and defeat obstacles.

short_description: Your Brother and his pregnant wife go to an old family cabin on the river to practice ancient Magik to save their unborn child. It's been months since you have heard from them, so you set out down the river to the cabin to find out what happened!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1070
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Surround Sound
